name: One Endless Night at MLG's 3 Remake
name_original: One Endless Night at MLG's 3 Remake
description:
Welcome to Keemstar's DramaAlert team. You must defend yourself, from the 4 characters, otherwise you will have to get right into the news.

Coded entirely by ToonsterGames

Voice Acting by Devin Manning and LordVaporwave360
